ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | rpgecld.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) |

| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_breqtrd | |- ( ph -> A < ( B + A ) ) |
